content: Investments REITs Asked by AnonymousAsked on 26 Jun 2019Which Reits screener do you use for accuracy? Realised that data on reitdata, sreitfifthperson,yieldsavvy and reitscreener are different.These screeners that I have been using all produce different results hence I don't have a solid figure to work with. Anyone has any recommendations?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

DeleteEditElijah LeeTop Contributor (Sep)Level 9. God of WisdomAnswered on 26 Jun 2019While the screeners give you an idea of the figures, to me, the best way to get the numbers is still through the annual report. Use the screener as a way of filtering out the REITs that you are interested in, but the numbers from the annual report will guide your decisions eventually.0 comments7
